title: Amazon, UPS, Exxon Are on Deck to Report Earnings in Coming Week
sub_head: Inflation and supply chains have been common topics on companiesâ€™ quarterly conference calls
body:
Amazon.com Inc., United Parcel Service Inc. and Exxon Mobil Corp. are among the companies headlining another busy earnings week, as investors continue to digest company comments about supply-chain challenges and inflation.
Also expected to report earnings are tech giants like Google parent company Alphabet Inc. and Facebook parent Meta Platforms Inc. ; auto makers Ford Motor Co. and General Motors Co. ; and other big names in manufacturing, pharmaceuticals and industrials.
